title: Harvard creates a material that lets light go 'infinitely fast'
text:
Harvard creates a material that lets light go 'infinitely fast' 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Researchers at Harvard University announced recently that they had successfully developed a means of manipulating light at the nanoscale, wh... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
